name: Roomba Fighter VII
description:
Roomba Fighter VII

This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021, but our project lead can't read time apparently so we missed the submission deadline.

Controls
WASD - Movement

Hold Left Mouse - Charge up attack

Release Left Mouse - Release Attack

If someone KO's you you can attack from their body to other players, as well as slightly influence movement.

The winner is the last player in control standing.
